name: You Drive Me Crazy
content: 宝贝 当我拥你入怀时
I can feel your loving magic charms
你那美妙的爱情 给我带来了温暖
You drive me crazy you drive me crazy
I start a floating around in paradise
You drive me crazy you drive me crazy
Down for you to give me a thrill
那是为了感受 你给予我的爱
每当你拥抱着我 每当你亲吻着我时
我的心跳加速 如同列车呼啸而过
显而易见 宝贝 我十分爱你
I love you baby it was meant to see
